sentence: Conversely, Joe Haldeman ' s 1974 anti-war, Hugo Award - and Nebula Award -winning science fiction novel The Forever War is popularly thought to be a direct reply to Starship Troopers, and though Haldeman has stated that it is actually a result of his personal experiences in the Vietnam War, he has admitted to being influenced by Starship Troopers.
